page.title: 12The Restaurant's Menu.
page.content: The menu at Prestbury Place caters for most people's tastes.The hors-d'oeuvres and starters include dishes,such as various soups,Melon Caribbean,Deep Fried Scampi,Mushrooms in Garlic Cream Sauce,prawns,avocados, etc. The main course includes various fish and meat dishes.Some of the fish dishes are Scampi Provencale,Grilled Trout,Baked Salmon,Poached Sole,etc. Meat dishes include Medallions of Beef,Sirloin Steak with Port Wine Sauce,Steak and Stout Pie,etc.Poultry dishes include Roast Duckling,Breast Chicken Kiev,Chicken Chasseur,etc. All these main meals are served with a selection of vegetables,potatoes,and salads. Afterwards,people can choose one of the sweets from the trolley,or cheese and biscuits,then coffee and mints.
